title: Son of the Ghost of the Invisible Spook

sources.title: Invisible Ghost
sources.description: 1941directed by Joseph Lewis starring Bela Lugosi, Polly Ann Young, John McGuire, Clarence Muse, Terry Walker and Betty Compson. While under a hypnotic spell induced by his, supposedly dead wife, the kindly Mr. Kessler goes a little cuckoo and murders his house guests. This copy has been sharpened a bit.

metadata.Plot: In the final installment of the GHOST trilogy, DTS returns to Ed Woods, this time to deal with the precocious offspring of "The Ghost" and "The Bride".
metadata.Actors: Derek Taylor Shayne, Ren√© Riva, Geoff Collins
